message:
"Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other"

Here some of our kids express their bit of gratitude to all those generous donors who are the reason for their smiles today.
Because creating qualities is not an act, its a culture, and thats what we at Gopali Youth Welfare Socoety believe in.
Making better citizens for the India tomorrow!

#gratitude #students #jvm #qualities #people #thankyou #smiles #donors #culture #jvm #gyws #iitkgp

Here it is!
Congratulations all the UG 1st years who have made through both the rounds of interviews!
Welcome to the GYWS Family!
We feel lucky to have such a talented lot join us. Looking forward to start working soon.

Here it is! The most awaited announcement is out!
The largest student-run govt registered NGO in India is recruiting RS Freshers!
Who are we looking for? Dedicated and dynamic people who think and work to give back to the society!
Have a look at the teams and turn up for the interviews!
You miss this, you miss a lot of your freshmen year!
We wish to see you there! 22nd Aug, F127 Main Building!
Be a reason for the change in a million lives!

Hello Freshers,
Want to be part of Indias largest student-run government registered  NGO? 
Here it is, the GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY!
Gopali Youth Welfare Society recruiting UG freshers for the post of Junior Executive Member! 
It's a chance to make your mark on society!
Register Over Here :https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeLOf6V7d6SCsv40zKSWkAww2mrDXQZj1BpZYmbITwWivtWag/viewform

Selection details :- 
Date - 22 August 2017
Time - 6pm-10pm
 Venue - V2, Vikramshila

Jagriti Vidya Mandir, the flagship initiative of GYWS, started in 2008 now houses over 200 underpreviliged students, most of whom receive free of cost education from Nursery to Class 5.
This has not just been a place for development but also an inspiration for each member and the society at large to be a part of the noble initiatives we put forward.
We are proud to present you a jest of JVM!

#jvm #gyws #kids #education #future #success #initiative #development

story: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared Prayas's post.
message: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared Prayas's post. As India marked its 70 years of Independence, PRAYAS celebrates the auspicious occasion by taking a step towards a better India. Team Prayas visited a village and attempted to put up a smile on each face by donating clothes. #spreadthesmile

story: Gopali Youth Welfare Society added 7 new photos.
message:
Jai hind! These words from the innocent mouths of the little kids marks the start of Independence Day for us!
And this is how the rest happened!
71st Independence day celebration at Jagriti Vidya Mandir.

#IndependenceDay #JVM #GYWS

Independence and freedom are much more than just relief from the foreigners but a chance to excel!
A mesmerising dance performance by Jagriti Vidya Mandir students in IIT Kharagpur on the occasion of Independence day!

Marking 70 years as a free nation, united we stand in honour of those great people, who have sacrificed for our country. We salute those soldiers and great men, because of whom we are safe and independent today. It's our day!
Happy Independence Day🇮🇳️

Design credit : Ishan Ranga

story: Gopali Youth Welfare Society added an event.
message:
Gopali Youth welfare society organising an introductory seminar for freshers! Be there to get an insight on our activities, achievements, and why to be a part of our family.

Time: 16-08-2017
